column4: Hello all first time in Ubuntu IRC.  Is this a good place to get questions answered?

Ubuntu update issue. I had ubunto 8.? installed and running. Upgraded to 8.10(?) OK and then decided to upgrade to 9.04. It hung and now when I start up I can login but then just get a blank screen. Any suggestions?
NO I did not back up before the upgrade.
can you swithc to a text console?
